amendment.description: To provide funding for an integrated scanning system for ports.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4574 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4574 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Coleman. (consideration: CR S7497-7498) To provide funding for an integrated scanning system for ports.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4574 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4574 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Coleman.
